Title: Front of the Class
Writer: Thomas Rickman, Brad Cohen (book), Lisa Wysocky (book)
Actors: James Wolk, Treat Williams, Dominic Scott Kay, Sarah Drew
Plot: After being challenged by Tourette's syndrome from a very young age, Brad Cohen defies all odds to become a gifted teacher. As Cohen grows up, he must face friends and classmates who don't realize that he sometimes cannot control his outbursts and a father who seems unwilling to accept his son's condition.
Production: Hallmark Hall of Fame Productions, McGee Street Productions
